messages.message: AWS architecture blog for document processing (mainly focusing on performance and reliability of document ingestion, chunking, and "sending for inference to an ML model") - have we done a competitive breakdown of AWS vs. Instabase and captured in a customer facing document?  That would be a powerful blog or series of blogs as customer proof points for why Instabase.  https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/architecture/building-a-scalable-document-pre-processing-pipeline/?sc_channel=sm&sc_campaign=AWS_Architecture_Blog&sc_publisher=LINKEDIN&sc_country=Global&sc_geo=GLOBAL&sc_outcome=awareness&trk=AWS_Architecture_Blog_LINKEDIN&linkId=88340054 (https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/architecture/building-a-scalable-document-pre-processing-pipeline/?sc_channel=sm&sc_campaign=AWS_Architecture_Blog&sc_publisher=LINKEDIN&sc_country=Global&sc_geo=GLOBAL&sc_outcome=awareness&trk=AWS_Architecture_Blog_LINKEDIN&linkId=88340054) cc/ @Ted
